markdown:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Nemnok the Devourer |image = Portrait_Nemnok_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Nemnok the Devourer.png |caption = |race = |subrace = |creature = Imp |gender = Neuter (implied Male) |culture = |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 20 |MIG = 22 |CON = 14 |DEX = 14 |PER = 17 |INT = 10 |RES = 20 |accuracy = 30 |deflection = 33 |fortitude = 11 |reflex = 21 |will = 23 |location = [Drowned Barrows](/drownedBarrows/) |quests = [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/) |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |internalname = CHA_CRE_Imp_Nemnok |guid = 6f21252c-1f84-4c1b-aba8-5bb9b90523b0 }} '''Nemnok the Devourer''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background Nemnok is the jumped-up imp who created a cult around himself at the Drowned Barrows. Attracting naga, eoten, and the nearby boreal dwarf tribe to worship him, Nemnok is quite the potent, charismatic force - if only he wasn't just an imp... An imp who found an amulet that made him smart enough to read grimoires and develop his literacy, while slaving under [Arkemyr](/arkemyr/). He then fled the Mansion, settling in the Drowned Barrows and slowly establishing a potent cult around himself, with the goal of becoming strong enough to rescue his compatriots from Arkemyr. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved =[Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/)
[The Lost Grimoires](/theLostGrimoires/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [Nemnok the Devourer](/nemnokTheDevourerQuest/): You can confront him and then defeat him. If you choose to let Nemnok live, he becomes a pet (regular [Nemnok](/nemnok/)) which grants +1 empower points * [The Lost Grimoires](/theLostGrimoires/): As tribute, he demands that you bring him three special grimoires. ## Trivia * Nemnok read backwards is Konmen which sounds exactly like conman, which he actually is. * He is voiced by [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0726184/ Sam Riegal], who voices a number of other characters in the game. [Category:Drowned Barrows characters](/categoryDrownedBarrowsCharacters/)
raw:
{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Nemnok the Devourer |image = Portrait_Nemnok_Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Nemnok the Devourer.png |caption = |race = |subrace = |creature = Imp |gender = Neuter (implied Male) |culture = |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = |class = |level = 20 |MIG = 22 |CON = 14 |DEX = 14 |PER = 17 |INT = 10 |RES = 20 |accuracy = 30 |deflection = 33 |fortitude = 11 |reflex = 21 |will = 23 |location = [[Drowned Barrows]] |quests = [[Nemnok the Devourer (quest)|Nemnok the Devourer]] |sells = |resting = |adventurers = |companion = |loot = |internalname = CHA_CRE_Imp_Nemnok |guid = 6f21252c-1f84-4c1b-aba8-5bb9b90523b0 }} '''Nemnok the Devourer''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ==Background== Nemnok is the jumped-up imp who created a cult around himself at the Drowned Barrows. Attracting naga, eoten, and the nearby boreal dwarf tribe to worship him, Nemnok is quite the potent, charismatic force - if only he wasn't just an imp... An imp who found an amulet that made him smart enough to read grimoires and develop his literacy, while slaving under [[Arkemyr]]. He then fled the Mansion, settling in the Drowned Barrows and slowly establishing a potent cult around himself, with the goal of becoming strong enough to rescue his compatriots from Arkemyr. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved =[[Nemnok the Devourer (quest)|Nemnok the Devourer]]
[[The Lost Grimoires]] |none = |other = }} ===Quests=== * [[Nemnok the Devourer (quest)|Nemnok the Devourer]]: You can confront him and then defeat him. If you choose to let Nemnok live, he becomes a pet (regular [[Nemnok]]) which grants +1 empower points * [[The Lost Grimoires]]: As tribute, he demands that you bring him three special grimoires. ==Trivia== * Nemnok read backwards is Konmen which sounds exactly like conman, which he actually is. * He is voiced by [https://www.imdb.com/name/nm0726184/ Sam Riegal], who voices a number of other characters in the game. [[Category:Drowned Barrows characters]]
title: Nemnok the Devourer
